author: Hatchy
created_time: August 01, 2023, 12:06:48 PMLast edit: August 01, 2023, 02:51:00 PM by Hatchy
content: As we all know most of Nigeria populations are aware of Bitcoin. So I was thinking about how many of Nigeria's top politicians, musicians, and actors or comedians might be involved in Bitcoin or cryptocurrency. It was also interesting to wonder if some of these celebs are part of this forum too, but due to anonymity, no one can reveal their true identity.The great thing about Bitcointalk is that everyone is treated equally regardless of their status (as long as you don't break the rules) which helps prevent intimidation. It's a place unlike our daily social medias. The main purpose of Bitcointalk, is to serve as a community for Bitcoiners and so we are not supposed to care if you are anybody out there.Lol, Im just a wiredo   If you happen to spot someone here who writes like a celebrity, feel free to give them a virtual nod or wink For me, @ cryptobrainboss be wan resemble- Burnaboy   The only person I haven't seen yet is OBO, wizkid I guess some others might be here somewhere. but remember, shhh... we'll keep their secret safe in the world of Bitcointalk anonymityI like the picture rep by CryptoHeadlineNews so I decided to add it to my thread (thanks)(Please no offenses, this thread wasn't meant to insult or reveal any ones identity so please don't even if you know them)

comments.author: Asiska02
comments.body: Celebrities of Nigeria that are into crypto are much but maybe only a few of them reveal it publicly as the ones you’ve mentioned above. I don’t think those celebrities that are into cryptocurrency will feel the need to join a forum like this. Because of their busy schedules and events, they’ll rather higher a good crypto trader to take care of their funds for them rather than them coming to learn about crypto in general here. If they want to trade they can hire someone to do that for them, if not they can just buy and hold and keep their private keys private. Even with this, they must have learnt about the security and privacy involved in cryptocurrency that’s not supposed to be exposed to the public. They can as well just sign an agreement to convict the person handing the funds for them if anything happens to their money. Celebrity life is very hectic, so I’m very sure that they’re not the ones handling the account no matter how much they have in crypto.
